attributes.action: Taxpayers vote MP's salary and pay increase. Work for the minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details: 11%wage rises, multiple closures,  reduced police presence. Name a few. Please share
attributes.background: Fed up of MP's saying they have the people's interests in mind when the have a a massive salary with expenses that we would be sent to prison for. If you want to work for your people you should take a people's wage!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
